question: Which state declared itself as a 'controlled area' amid the outbreak of the Avian Influenza?
explanation:
The entire state of Punjab has been declared a 'controlled area' amidst the outbreak of the Avian Influenza (Bird Flu) in neighbouring states.
It has also imposed a complete ban on the import of live birds and unprocessed poultry meat into the state. Bird Flu has been reported from as many as six states including Kerala, Rajasthan, Madhya Pradesh, Himachal Pradesh, Haryana, and Gujarat.
